Class MediaModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • MediaModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MediaModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class fulfills the role of the model in the MVC design format
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void degreesOfSeperation(MediaMaker mm1,
                                MediaMaker mm2,
                                int maxDepth,
                                MediaMaker baseNameCheck)
        This method will perform the necessary steps to find the degrees of seperation between the passed in MediaMakers
        Parameters:
        mm1 - First MediaMaker (the node)
        mm2 - Second MediaMaker (the one you are looking for a connection to)

      • saveTxt

        public void saveTxt(java.io.File file)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This method will write all existing information in the model to the specified text file by going through each list containing information and writing to the file using a BufferedWriter
        Parameters:
        file - The specified File to write to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - To be caught in the controller

                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
